WindowSharedStorage.summary: NOTE Experimental The WindowSharedStorage interface of the {{domxref("Shared Storage API", "Shared Storage API", "", "nocode")}} represents the shared storage for a particular origin within a standard browsing context.

WindowSharedStorageRun.summary:
NOTE Experimental The run() method of the
interface executes a run operation that is registered in a module added to the current origin's .

blockquote.para: The Run output gate is intended as a generic way to process some shared storage data.

WindowSharedStorageSelectURL.summary:
NOTE Experimental The selectURL() method of the
interface executes a URL Selection operation that is registered in a module added to the current origin's .

blockquote.para: The URL Selection output gate is used to select a URL from a provided list to display to the user, based on shared storage data.

WindowSharedStorageSelectURL.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object or a string representing a URL, depending on the value of the resolveToConfig option.

WindowSharedStorageWorklet.summary:
NOTE Experimental The worklet read-only property of the
interface contains the instance representing the shared storage worklet for the current origin.

remarks.para: SharedStorageWorklet contains the method, which is used to add a module to the shared storage worklet.
